Title: Les Enfants du Sang
Writer: Sam Catlin (developed by), Seth Rogen (developed by), Evan Goldberg (developed by), Garth Ennis (based on the graphic novels by), Steve Dillon (based on the graphic novels by), Rachel Wagner
Actors: Dominic Cooper, Joseph Gilgun, Ruth Negga, Graham McTavish
Plot: Tulip, Jesse, Jody and T.C. hatch an ambitious plan to save both Gran'ma's and Tulip's lives. Cassidy explores a new friendship in New Orleans.
